result.eng: The less money they have the better.
result.ga: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearr
result.orig: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearr
result.html: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearrThe less money they have the better.
result.ponchtml: Dá laġad airgead atá acu is ea is fearrThe less money they have the better.

result.eng: The smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.
result.ga: Dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn sí
result.orig: Dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn sí
result.html: Dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn síThe smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.
result.ponchtml: Dá laġad an t-ualaċ atá uirṫi is sásta a ḃíonn síThe smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.

result.eng: It will take at least six years.
result.ga: Glacfaidh sé sé bliana ar a laghad
result.orig: Glacfaidh sé sé bliana ar a laghad
result.html: Glacfaidh sé sé bliana ar a laghadIt will take at least six years.
result.ponchtml: Glacfaiḋ sé sé bliana ar a laġadIt will take at least six years.

result.eng: I had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.
result.ga: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa orm
result.orig: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa orm
result.html: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa ormI had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ tuairim dá laġad orm cad ba ċóir dom a ḋéanaṁ aċ ċuir sise coṁairle mo leasa ormI had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.

result.eng: The number of men who are teachers is decreasing.
result.ga: Tá líon na bhfear atá ina múinteoirí ag dul i laghad

result.ponchtml: Tá líon na ḃfear atá ina múinteoirí ag dul i laġadThe number of men who are teachers is decreasing.
